text: Tracy Pollan (born June 22, 1960) is an American actress. She is best known for her work on the sitcom Family Ties She is married to actor Michael J. Fox. They have 4 children. Pollan was born on June 22, 1960 in Long Island, New York. Pollan is from Russian Jewish descent. == Other websites == * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American television actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Michael J. Fox
title: Tracy Pollan
